text: Petalodontiformes ("thin-plate teeth") is an extinct order of cartilaginous fish. They are related to the modern-day chimaera found in what is now the United States and Europe. == Petalodontidae == * †Ageleodus * †Antliodus * †Chomatodus * †Ctenoptychius * †Glyphanodus * †Harpacodus * †Lisogodus * †Neopetalodus * †Paracymatodus * †Petalodus * †Polyrhizodus * †Serratodus * †Siksika * †Tanaodus Category:Extinct fish Category:Cartilaginous fish
title: Petalodontiformes
